transcript:
Alice: We will deliver the sales deck by 2025-12-01.
Action: Rohit (rohit@example.com) will prepare the slides.
Bob: Please assign someone to check the budget.
Carol: Todo: schedule follow-up meeting next week.
David: Action: Anu (anu@example.com) to confirm the vendor details by 2025-11-30.
